special_powers.name: THE LUCKY NUMBER
special_powers.description: Bilbo Baggins can use Shape Change. Bilbo Baggins can use Probability Control, but only when he is not the attacker or a target of the attack.

special_powers.name: I AM GANDALF, AND GANDALF MEANS ME!
special_powers.description: As you reveal your force, you may choose 1 keyword possessed by another character on your force. Gandalf possesses that keyword this game in addition to his other keywords.

special_powers.name: LETS HAVE THE CONTRACT
special_powers.description: Gandalf can use Outwit and Perplex. If Gandalf uses Perplex to target another friendly character with whom he shares a keyword, he may use it normally, or he may modify any combat value other than damage by +2 or -2.

special_powers.name: WE MUST AWAY 'ERE BREAK OF DAY
special_powers.description: Thorin Oakenshield can use the Carry ability. When he does, he may carry two friendly characters if they both share a keyword with him. Thorin Oakenshield's speed value is not modified by the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: ON THE HUNT
special_powers.description: Fimbul the Hunter can use Charge and Stealth.

special_powers.name: UHKLAT & UMRAZ
special_powers.description: Dwalin the Dwarf can use Flurry. When he does, modify his attack value by +1 for the second attack if he targets a different character from the first attack.

special_powers.name: HAVE YOUR SCENT
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character. If Grinnah the Goblin ends a move action adjacent to the chosen character, he may make a close combat attack against the character as a free action.

special_powers.name: DEFEND THE KING!
special_powers.description: Kili the Dwarf can use Defend. When a friendly character named Thorin Oakenshield is adjacent to Kili the Dwarf, that character modifies his defense value by +1, if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: DWARVEN MATTOCK
special_powers.description: When Bofur the Dwarf makes an attack, if his attack total is at least 3 greater than his target's defense value, you may choose that the attack causes knock back.

special_powers.name: DORI, ORI, AND NORI
special_powers.description: When Dori the Dwarf is adjacent to a friendly character that has no action tokens and is named Ori the Dwarf or Nori the Dwarf, he can use the Duo Attack ability. When he does, modify his damage value by +1 and the adjacent friendly character can't be given a non-free action this turn.

special_powers.name: ORI, NORI, AND DORI
special_powers.description: Ori the Dwarf can use Perplex. Ori the Dwarf can use Perplex a second time during your turn, but must be given a power action instead of a free action to use it and may only target friendly characters named Dori the Dwarf or Nori the Dwarf.

special_powers.name: THORIN & COMPANY
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Thorin Oakenshield is within 8 squares, Gloin the Dwarf can use Charge and modify his attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: HELP FROM THE EAGLES
special_powers.description: Give Radagast an epic action and choose up to 1 friendly character per 200 points of the build total within line of fire. Those characters can use the Flight ability this turn and may immediately be given a move action as a free action.

special_powers.name: WIZARD OF THE EARTH
special_powers.description: Radagast can use Toughness and Barrier.

special_powers.name: ONLY I AM WORTHY
special_powers.description: Give Saruman an epic action and choose a relic on the map within line of fire. Choose up to 1 friendly character for every 200 points of the build total. Each chosen character may be given a free action to roll a d6 for the chosen relic and, if successful, the relic is placed on Saruman's character card and he may use the relic.

special_powers.name: THE SEARCH, HIDDEN
special_powers.description: Saruman can use Stealth. When Saruman is adjacent to blocking terrain or an object, he can use Phasing/Teleport and, if he moved 4 squares or less, after actions resolve, he may make a ranged combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: VILYA, THE RING OF AIR
special_powers.description: When Elrond is the target of Outwit roll a d6: on a result of 5 or 6 Elrond ignores that use of Outwit.

special_powers.name: LORD OF IMALDRIS
special_powers.description: Elrond can use Leadership and when he does, modify the result by +1, maximum 6.

special_powers.name: NENYA, THE RING OF ADAMANT
special_powers.description: Galadriel can use Mind Control as if she had a range value of 8 and "2 targets". When she does, modify her attack value by +3 and she takes a maximum of 1 damage due to the targets' combined point values.  When Galadriel is the target of a Mind Control attack modify her defense value by +3.

special_powers.name: GET BEHIND ME!
special_powers.description: Bombur the Dwarf may use Defend. When a friendly character named Bifur the Dwarf, Bofur the Dwarf, or Bilbo Baggins is adjacent to Bombur the Dwarf, that character modifies his defense value by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: NORI, DORI, AND ORI
special_powers.description: Nori the Dwarf can use Probability Control but may only target himself and friendly characters named Ori the Dwarf or Dori the Dwarf.

special_powers.name: THORIN & COMPANY
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Thorin Oakshield is within 8 squares, Balin the Dwarf can use Charge and modifies his attack value by +1.

name: Fili the Dwarf and Kili the Dwarf

special_powers.name: HAMMER, THEN ARROW
special_powers.description: When Fili the Dwarf and Kili the Dwarf use the Duo Attack ability, they may use Quake instead of the first attack. Fili the Dwarf and Kili the Dwarf's damage is not modified by the Duo Attack ability.

special_powers.name: GOBLIN-CLEAVER AND FOE-HAMMER SHINING COLD
special_powers.description: When Gandalf and Thorin Oakenshield make a close combat or ranged combat attack, instead of an attack roll, roll 2d6.  If the result is not doubles the attack hits.  This power can't be countered. Friendly characters can't use Probability Control when Gandalf and Thorin Oakenshield attack.

special_powers.name: ONE OF US SHOULD BE IN CHARGE
special_powers.description: Other characters can't use Leadership. When Gandalf and Thorin Oakenshield use the Duo Attack ability, they may use either Penetrating/Psychic Blast or Close Combat Expert for the first attack.

special_powers.name: BURGLING IS THE ART OF REMAINING UNSEEN
special_powers.description: Bilbo Baggins can use Stealth.

special_powers.name: ALONE... AND IN THE DARK
special_powers.description: If no friendly character is within 6 squares of Bilbo Baggins, modify his combat values by +1.

special_powers.name: DEEP DOWN BY THE DARK WATER
special_powers.description: Gollum has [m-dolphin]

special_powers.name: RIDDLES TO ESCAPE
special_powers.description: Gollum can use Toughness. When Gollum would be hit by an attack, roll 2d6 and add it to Gollum's attack value. If the result is greater than the attacker's attack result, Gollum evades the attack.

special_powers.name: CUT LOOSE THE DWARVES
special_powers.description: Give Bilbo Baggins an Epic Action. For every 200 points of the build total, he may remove up to one action token from a different adjacent character, and modify that character's speed and attack values by -1.

special_powers.name: NARYA, THE RING OF FIRE
special_powers.description: Give Gandalf a double power action to use Outwit as a free action even if he has used Outwit on this turn already. Gandalf's combat values may not be modified by opposing characters.

special_powers.name: THROUGH DUNGEON'S DEEP AND CAVERNS OLD
special_powers.description: Give Thorin Oakenshield an epic action. Choose up to one adjacent friendly figure per 100 points of the build total with the Thorin & Company keyword. Chosen characters can use Willpower until your next turn and modify their speed value by +1.

special_powers.name: RALLY THE ORC WARBAND
special_powers.description: Give Bolg an epic action. Friendly horde tokens within 8 squares with "Orc" or "Goblin" in their name modify their attack values by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: BRED TO BE RIDDEN
special_powers.description: When Warg carries a character with the Dol Guldur keyword, his speed value is not modified by the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: PACK LEADER
special_powers.description: Then Great Warg carries a character with "Orc" in its name, his speed value is not modified by the Carry ability. Friendly horde tokens whose name include "Warg" can use the Carry ability, but only to carry characters with "Orc" in its name.

special_powers.name: TRAPPED BY THE GOBLIN KING
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, give The Goblin King an epic action. The Goblin King can use Leadership once for each 200 points of the build total. Each time the result is 3-4, The Goblin King can use Perplex, but only to target another friendly character he has not targeted with Perplex this turn.

special_powers.name: THE STRONGEST OF THE GOBLINS
special_powers.description: The Goblin King can use Energy Shield/Deflection. When The Goblin King is the target of Outwit roll a d6; on a result of 5 or 6 The Goblin King ignores that use of Outwit.

special_powers.name: HORDE: MOB MELEE
special_powers.description: When stacked, Goblin Swarm can use Flurry.

special_powers.name: HORDE: PACK HUNTING
special_powers.description: When stacked, replace Warg's damage value with (S).

special_powers.name: HORDE: PINNED DOWN
special_powers.description: When stacked, Goblin Archer replace their range value with 4 + (S).

special_powers.name: HORDE: DEATH FROM ABOVE
special_powers.description: When stacked, Eagle can use Charge.

special_powers.name: HORDE: HIDDEN SENTRIES
special_powers.description: When stacked, Rivendell Guard can use Stealth.

special_powers.name: HORDE: FANGED PATROL
special_powers.description: When stacked, Warg Charger can use Blades/Claws/Fangs.
Character can use Exploit Weakness, but only to target characters with the Monster keyword.

Character can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When it is given a close combat action, it may modify its attack value by +2; if it does and hits, it must roll for Blades/Claws/Fangs and the result is a maximum of 3.
